Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: ibex snout
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The jaw of an Ibex goat

li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face seems to be swelling, the nose and jaw pressing out and looking decidedly more like an animal's.
A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a goat. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are squared off; speaking is more difficult, but eating is easier. The urge to bleat is extraordinarily powerful.

li.label: adapted
li.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a goat. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are squared off; speaking is more difficult, but eating is easier. Adaptation has removed some of the difficulty with speaking.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: ibex ear
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Fluffy, caprine ears sit at the side of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, like an Ibex goat

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: ibex tail
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A tail like that of an Ibex goat. It's very wooly but short and not very useful.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: ibex eye
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has rectangular pupils set in yellow eyes that are pressed slightly further to the side of the head. This gives better peripepheral vision, but does make it slightly harder to aim.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: ibex horns
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The curved horns of an ibex. They start small, but will eventually grow to full size. Horn growth does not require the constant work of mutagenic mechanites.

li.description: Small horn nubs top [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, which add a heft to a headbutt. They are small for now, and will take many weeks to grow to full size.
Curved horns decorate [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, which add a heft to a headbutt. They have grown larger, but still have a little more growing to do.
Caprine horns decorate [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, which add a heft to a headbutt. They have reached their full size.
